data.text:
@EU_Commission @Kaguta & his wife @JanetMuseveni are deliberately killing the education in Uganda. The increased teenage pregnancies; is so worrying too. Our children deserve better.
Education is a human right. 
#UgandaIsBleeding
#FreeAllPoliticalPrisonersinUganda
#UgMoving4wd
#EducUg 
@UNESCO

@EU_Commission If @KagutaMuseveni can't hold free & fair elections, how can he be trusted when it comes to peace & security?
He calls himself the master of violence & thinks no one else can lead Uganda out of his misrule. So,he can do anything to stay on power; including framing his opponents📍
@EU_Commission Any plans to stop moving the entire European Parliament from Brussels to Strasbourg every month to save energy? No? Thought not.

@EU_Commission @EUCourtPress Ok, so EC does *not* treat the publication of the Polish Constitutional court ruling as a formal request by Poland to leave the EU, but rather leaves a door open. Quite appeasing ...

@EU_Commission Author Barbara Goff once said that: “ ambiguity when it consist of not calling a spade a spade enables evil to circumvent good.”  T.P.L.F is a Terrorist Org. unless T.P.L.F / T.D.F change its behavior or get Disarmed, peace in Ethiopia & East Africa is doubtful.
